hackathon-description-text: Join the Hackathon Queen, for “The Big Six” (aka Casino Hackathon) In just one day we’re building insane Casino games, then having a gameathon demo session to award prizes to the best Casino games.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Co- Founder and CEO of Plumbee and Board Director International, Social Games Association

hackathon-eligibility: Teams, games startups and individuals are able to enter the hackathon. Participants need to be 18 years and over.
hackathon-requirements: We are making Casino games and social gambling games on any theme are acceptable for entry for the hackathon.
hackathon-rules: The rules are that hacks can be created both on the day and can pre-exsisting. There are two categories for entry hacks made on the day and pre-exsisting social games demos to be judged separately.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The prize is Champagne & a Certificate
The prize is Prosecco & a Certificate
The prize is Prosecco & a Certificate

We are pleased to announce a special prize award sponsored by Innovation Warehouse of 2 months free hot desking for the team, startup or indivdual that impresses most on the day. (To be redeem within 3 months of the event)

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Russell Square House, 10-12 Russell Square, London, Greater London WC1B 5EE, UK

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
We will be asking the judges the consider the following criteria when judging:

• Creative use of Red Ruby! 
• Application Design/UX 
• Technical Wow!

hackathon-location-address: Russell Square House, 10-12 Russell Square, London, Greater London WC1B 5EE, UK
hackathon-description-header: A Casino Games Hackathon at a London Casino!
